author: William Heath
comment: Very funky watch face. We'll recommended to anybody who wants something different.
title: Winner!

author: Matthew Anon
comment: I used it for a day because it looks cool and minimalist. I stopped using it because my watch had trouble waking up, only while using this watch face. I'm not sure if it's Orbital's fault or not; I just see that the problem goes away when I use a different face.

reply.author: 33Labs
reply.content: Hi Matthew. Thanks for your comment. We have fixed this error in the latest version (1.4)

title: Looks neat on the Moto360

author: Paulo Furtado
comment: When I put this on my moto 360, it wouldn't turn on, it looks great, though.

reply.author: 33Labs
reply.content: Hi Paulo. Thanks for your comment. We have fixed this error in the latest version (1.4)

title: Cool, but buggy...

author: Michael Brown
comment: Would love to see more colors in the future.
title: Pretty cool app
